text:
Win2k prof. works fine here. Do you have some more info about the pages?
(static, dynamic, what and how). Do you have some firewall or antivirus software
running?

What additional modules, e.g. PHP or mod_includes have you configured
  to process page content?  Which W2K service pack are you running?
creator: wrowe@apache.org

text:
No further response. Assuming issue resolved.

Please reopen the bug if this is not the case and you can provide the requested
information.

Thanks for using Apache.
